column4: is there something fundamentally wrong with my thinking or something, because i don't see why no one thought of anything like this.
does anyone think my idea for changing the package manager is good?
i really would like some help with this
people just don't seem to be giving me any attention
i was trying to get help a few times on the irc channel a few times before
i either talked to no one or someone who knew less than i did
some unix distros *do* just grab updates automatically from sources
i bet that'll get answered before me
why is that not seen as superior?
besides the source thing, but you don't need to do that
because building sources takes a lot of energy and that takes time and money
